extendedInfo.description: Mis Tarjetas es una aplicaciÃ³n sencilla y prÃ¡ctica para llevar tus tarjetas siempre contigo.Mis Tarjetas es especialmente interesante con las tarjetas de fidelidad que funcionen con cÃ³digo de barras, ya que podrÃ¡s usarla sin necesidad de llevarlas encima.Con Mis Tarjetas podrÃ¡s guardar una imagen de su DNI, tarjetas de presentacion, tarjetas de coordenadas, tarjetas de crÃ©dito, etc. de forma rÃ¡pida y sencilla.Es una alternativa a la famosa app Fidme, con la diferencia de que Mis tarjetas es mÃ¡s ligera, sencilla y no requiere registrarse, aunque buscando el mismo objetivo.

reviews.title: Good but needs a lock.
reviews.comment: Not sure if you can set one but all my data is free and easy pickings if I lost my phone.
reviews.author: Sarah W

reviews.title: Crap! and Scam?
reviews.comment: I went to all the trouble of setting up lighting and entering 12 loyalty cards into this cr-app. When done I went through to check barcode reads to find that the card list only contained a few of the cards I enetered and as a scrolled down they just repeated in no particular order. DO NOT ENTER YOUR CREDIT CARDS INTO THIS APP!! DELETING IT RIGHT NOW!
reviews.author: Matt Druce

reviews.comment: love it! now i still need to ensure that all shops actually accept it.
reviews.author: Vince Lau

reviews.title: Needs a few extra features to be perfect
reviews.comment: I scanned all my cards on my pc but there is no option to import them using this app. A simple option to import from gallery would fix this.  Also the ability to add text notes to the card.
reviews.author: Vandetta Ny
